content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 4, Villarreal 0.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 4, Villarreal 0.
Foul by Mateo Musacchio (Villarreal).
Iván Ramis (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Iván Ramis.
Attempt blocked. Borja Valero (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Bruno Soriano.
Gonzalo Castellani (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gianni Zuiverloon (Mallorca).
Dangerous play by Borja Valero (Villarreal).
Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Tomás Pina (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Tomás Pina (Mallorca).
Alejandro Martinuccio (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Borja Valero (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alejandro Alfaro (Mallorca).
Attempt saved. Nunes (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro with a cross.
Foul by Gonzalo Rodríguez (Villarreal).
Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Mallorca. Tomás Pina replaces Fernando Tissone.
Substitution, Villarreal. Hernán Pérez replaces Marcos Senna.
Attempt saved. Marcos Senna (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Alejandro Martinuccio.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Nunes.
Attempt saved. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) right footed shot from long range on the right is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Gianni Zuiverloon.
Foul by Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca).
Gonzalo Castellani (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Pablo Cáceres.
Foul by Iván Ramis (Mallorca).
Marco Ruben (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Mallorca. Gianni Zuiverloon replaces Martí Crespí because of an injury.
Borja Valero (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alejandro Alfaro (Mallorca).
Attempt blocked. Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Víctor Casadesús.
Substitution, Villarreal. Gonzalo Castellani replaces Cani.
Substitution, Mallorca. Alejandro Alfaro replaces Tomer Hemed.
Goal!  Mallorca 4, Villarreal 0. Nunes (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Gonzalo Rodríguez.
Goal!  Mallorca 3, Villarreal 0. Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro following a fast break.
Joan Oriol (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Tomer Hemed (Mallorca).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) because of an injury.
Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcos Senna (Villarreal).
Offside, Mallorca. Martí Crespí tries a through ball, but Tomer Hemed is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Alejandro Martinuccio (Villarreal) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Mario Gaspar with a cross.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Fernando Tissone.
Attempt blocked. Mario Gaspar (Villarreal) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Cani.
Goal!  Mallorca 2, Villarreal 0. Martí (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tomer Hemed with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Martí (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Bruno Soriano (Villarreal).
Attempt missed. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Tomer Hemed with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Iván Ramis (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Bruno Soriano.
Foul by Borja Valero (Villarreal).
Michael Pereira (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt blocked. Mario Gaspar (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Cani.
Foul by Mario Gaspar (Villarreal).
Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Villarreal. Alejandro Martinuccio replaces Javier Camuñas.
Second Half begins Mallorca 1, Villarreal 0.
First Half ends, Mallorca 1, Villarreal 0.
